metadata.description: Gifted pianist Saki wants nothing more than to see his young cousin-- the talented Riya-- succeed as a professional musician. So why is a (handsome) face from Saki's past suddenly threatening to tear him away from reality? Will this fragile butterfly finally learn to ride the winds of change with grace and maturity-- or will he get swept away in a reckless moment?
metadata.name: Butterfly of the Distant Day
